Wildflower Honey

Harvested from bees that forage on diverse, organic wildflower fields, our honey boasts a complex flavor profile that varies with the seasons. This natural sweetener is raw and unfiltered, preserving all the beneficial enzymes and pollens.

Product Details:

  • Weight: 12 oz jars.
  • Packaging: Glass jars.
  • Nutritional Information: Rich in antioxidants, natural enzymes, and pollen.
